inputHint: Type a math expression like 5 times 3 or 20% of 100
resultHint: Double tap to share this result
totalHint: Double tap to share the total

document.saveHint: Double tap to save this document to history
document.clearHint: Double tap to clear all calculations
document.titleHint: Double tap to edit the document title
document.titleInputHint: Enter a new title for this document
document.cancelHint: Double tap to cancel and keep current title
document.saveNewTitleHint: Double tap to save the new title
document.newDocHint: Double tap to create a new document. Current document will be auto-saved.

clearAlert.title: Clear Document
clearAlert.message: Are you sure you want to clear all calculations?
